item.title: DaloRADIUS: Setting up a FreeRadius server with DaloRADIUS web interface
item.description:
Here is documentation that allows you to set up FreeRadius with MySQL account management and a web interface with DaloRADIUS:

Authentication Authorization Accounting with FreeRadius MySQL backend web based Management with DaloRADIUS
